documentation.name: cli:analyze
documentation.description: Read-only codebase analysis using Gemini (default), Qwen, or Codex with auto-pattern detection and template selection

documentation.name: cli:chat
documentation.description: Read-only Q&A interaction with Gemini/Qwen/Codex for codebase questions with automatic context inference

documentation.name: cli:cli-init
documentation.description: Generate .gemini/ and .qwen/ config directories with settings.json and ignore files based on workspace technology detection

documentation.name: memory:load-skill-memory
documentation.description: Activate SKILL package (auto-detect from paths/keywords or manual) and intelligently load documentation based on task intent keywords

documentation.name: memory:skill-memory
documentation.description: 4-phase autonomous orchestrator: check docs → /memory:docs planning → /workflow:execute → generate SKILL.md with progressive loading index (skips phases 2-3 if docs exist)

documentation.name: memory:tech-research
documentation.description: 3-phase orchestrator: extract tech stack from session/name → delegate to agent for Exa research and module generation → generate SKILL.md index (skips phase 2 if exists)

documentation.name: memory:workflow-skill-memory
documentation.description: Process WFS-* archived sessions using universal-executor agents with Gemini analysis to generate workflow-progress SKILL package (sessions-timeline, lessons, conflicts)

documentation.name: task:replan
documentation.description: Update task JSON with new requirements or batch-update multiple tasks from verification report, tracks changes in task-changes.json

documentation.name: workflow:ui-design:animation-extract
documentation.description: Extract animation and transition patterns from URLs, CSS, or interactive questioning for design system documentation

documentation.name: workflow:ui-design:imitate-auto
documentation.description: High-speed multi-page UI replication with batch screenshot capture and design token extraction

documentation.name: workflow:ui-design:style-extract
documentation.description: Extract design style from reference images or text prompts using Claude analysis with variant generation

session-management.name: cli:codex-execute
session-management.description: Multi-stage Codex execution with automatic task decomposition into grouped subtasks using resume mechanism for context continuity

session-management.name: cli:discuss-plan
session-management.description: Multi-round collaborative planning using Gemini, Codex, and Claude synthesis with iterative discussion cycles (read-only, no code changes)

session-management.name: cli:execute
session-management.description: Autonomous code implementation with YOLO auto-approval using Gemini/Qwen/Codex, supports task ID or description input with automatic file pattern detection

session-management.name: enhance-prompt
session-management.description: Enhanced prompt transformation using session memory and codebase analysis with --enhance flag detection

session-management.name: workflow:brainstorm:api-designer
session-management.description: Generate or update api-designer/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for API design perspective
session-management.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

session-management.name: workflow:brainstorm:artifacts
session-management.description: Interactive clarification generating confirmed guidance specification through role-based analysis and synthesis

session-management.name: workflow:brainstorm:auto-parallel
session-management.description: Parallel brainstorming automation with dynamic role selection and concurrent execution across multiple perspectives

session-management.name: workflow:brainstorm:system-architect
session-management.description: Generate or update system-architect/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for system architecture perspective
session-management.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

session-management.name: workflow:execute
session-management.description: Coordinate agent execution for workflow tasks with automatic session discovery, parallel task processing, and status tracking

session-management.name: workflow:plan
session-management.description: 5-phase planning workflow with Gemini analysis and action-planning-agent task generation, outputs IMPL_PLAN.md and task JSONs with optional CLI auto-execution

session-management.name: workflow:session:complete
session-management.description: Mark active workflow session as complete, archive with lessons learned, update manifest, remove active flag

session-management.name: workflow:session:list
session-management.description: List all workflow sessions with status filtering, shows session metadata and progress information

session-management.name: workflow:session:resume
session-management.description: Resume the most recently paused workflow session with automatic session discovery and status update

session-management.name: workflow:session:start
session-management.description: Discover existing sessions or start new workflow session with intelligent session management and conflict detection

session-management.name: workflow:tdd-plan
session-management.description: TDD workflow planning with Red-Green-Refactor task chain generation, test-first development structure, and cycle tracking

session-management.name: workflow:tdd-verify
session-management.description: Verify TDD workflow compliance against Red-Green-Refactor cycles, generate quality report with coverage analysis

session-management.name: workflow:test-cycle-execute
session-management.description: Execute test-fix workflow with dynamic task generation and iterative fix cycles until all tests pass or max iterations reached

session-management.name: workflow:tools:test-task-generate
session-management.description: Generate test-fix task JSON with iterative test-fix-retest cycle specification using Gemini/Qwen/Codex

analysis.name: cli:mode:bug-diagnosis
analysis.description: Read-only bug root cause analysis using Gemini/Qwen/Codex with systematic diagnosis template for fix suggestions

implementation.name: cli:mode:code-analysis
implementation.description: Read-only execution path tracing using Gemini/Qwen/Codex with specialized analysis template for call flow and optimization

implementation.name: memory:load
implementation.description: Delegate to universal-executor agent to analyze project via Gemini/Qwen CLI and return JSON core content package for task context

implementation.name: memory:update-full
implementation.description: Update all CLAUDE.md files using layer-based execution (Layer 3→1) with batched agents (4 modules/agent) and gemini→qwen→codex fallback, <20 modules uses direct parallel

implementation.name: memory:update-related
implementation.description: Update CLAUDE.md for git-changed modules using batched agent execution (4 modules/agent) with gemini→qwen→codex fallback, <15 modules uses direct execution

implementation.name: task:execute
implementation.description: Execute task JSON using appropriate agent (@doc-generator/@implementation-agent/@test-agent) with pre-analysis context loading and status tracking

implementation.name: workflow:brainstorm:data-architect
implementation.description: Generate or update data-architect/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for data architecture perspective
implementation.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

implementation.name: workflow:brainstorm:product-manager
implementation.description: Generate or update product-manager/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for product management perspective
implementation.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

implementation.name: workflow:brainstorm:product-owner
implementation.description: Generate or update product-owner/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for product ownership perspective
implementation.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

implementation.name: workflow:brainstorm:subject-matter-expert
implementation.description: Generate or update subject-matter-expert/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for domain expertise perspective
implementation.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

implementation.name: workflow:brainstorm:ux-expert
implementation.description: Generate or update ux-expert/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for UX perspective
implementation.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

implementation.name: workflow:resume
implementation.description: Resume paused workflow session with automatic progress analysis, pending task identification, and conflict detection
implementation.arguments: session-id for workflow session to resume

implementation.name: workflow:tools:context-gather
implementation.description: Intelligently collect project context using context-search-agent based on task description, packages into standardized JSON

implementation.name: workflow:tools:test-context-gather
implementation.description: Collect test coverage context using test-context-search-agent and package into standardized test-context JSON

planning.name: cli:mode:plan
planning.description: Read-only architecture planning using Gemini/Qwen/Codex with strategic planning template for modification plans and impact analysis

planning.name: memory:docs
planning.description: Plan documentation workflow with dynamic grouping (≤10 docs/task), generates IMPL tasks for parallel module trees, README, ARCHITECTURE, and HTTP API docs

planning.name: task:breakdown
planning.description: Decompose complex task into subtasks with dependency mapping, creates child task JSONs with parent references and execution order

planning.name: workflow:action-plan-verify
planning.description: Perform non-destructive cross-artifact consistency analysis between IMPL_PLAN.md and task JSONs with quality gate validation

planning.name: workflow:brainstorm:scrum-master
planning.description: Generate or update scrum-master/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for Agile process perspective
planning.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

planning.name: workflow:brainstorm:ui-designer
planning.description: Generate or update ui-designer/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for UI design perspective
planning.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

planning.name: workflow:tools:task-generate-agent
planning.description: Autonomous task generation using action-planning-agent with discovery and output phases for workflow planning

planning.name: workflow:tools:task-generate-tdd
planning.description: Generate TDD task chains with Red-Green-Refactor dependencies, test-first structure, and cycle validation

testing.name: task:create
testing.description: Generate task JSON from natural language description with automatic file pattern detection, scope inference, and dependency analysis

testing.name: workflow:review
testing.description: Post-implementation review with specialized types (security/architecture/action-items/quality) using analysis agents and Gemini

testing.name: workflow:test-fix-gen
testing.description: Create test-fix workflow session from session ID, description, or file path with test strategy generation and task planning

testing.name: workflow:test-gen
testing.description: Create independent test-fix workflow session from completed implementation session, analyzes code to generate test tasks

testing.name: workflow:tools:tdd-coverage-analysis
testing.description: Analyze test coverage and TDD cycle execution with Red-Green-Refactor compliance verification

testing.name: workflow:tools:test-concept-enhanced
testing.description: Analyze test requirements and generate test generation strategy using Gemini with test-context package

utilities.name: version
utilities.description: Display Claude Code version information and check for updates

brainstorming.name: workflow:brainstorm:synthesis
brainstorming.description: Clarify and refine role analyses through intelligent Q&A and targeted updates with synthesis agent

brainstorming.name: workflow:tools:conflict-resolution
brainstorming.description: Detect and resolve conflicts between plan and existing codebase using CLI-powered analysis with Gemini/Qwen

monitoring.name: workflow:status
monitoring.description: Generate on-demand task status views from JSON task data with optional task-id filtering for detailed view

ui-design.name: workflow:ui-design:batch-generate
ui-design.description: Prompt-driven batch UI generation using target-style-centric parallel execution with design token application

ui-design.name: workflow:ui-design:capture
ui-design.description: Batch screenshot capture for UI design workflows using MCP puppeteer or local fallback with URL mapping

ui-design.name: workflow:ui-design:explore-auto
ui-design.description: Exploratory UI design workflow with style-centric batch generation, creates design variants from prompts/images with parallel execution

ui-design.name: workflow:ui-design:explore-layers
ui-design.description: Interactive deep UI capture with depth-controlled layer exploration using MCP puppeteer

ui-design.name: workflow:ui-design:generate
ui-design.description: Assemble UI prototypes by combining layout templates with design tokens, pure assembler without new content generation

ui-design.name: workflow:ui-design:layout-extract
ui-design.description: Extract structural layout information from reference images, URLs, or text prompts using Claude analysis

ui-design.name: workflow:ui-design:update
ui-design.description: Update brainstorming artifacts with finalized design system references from selected prototypes
